snippet.title: HITMAN World of Assassination - PSVR2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add a headset to your loadout when HITMAN World of Assassination arrives on PlayStation VR 2 in December 2024.

Step into the shoes of Agent 47 and immerse yourself in the world of assassination like never before with brand new VR features such as intuitive controls, room scale implementation and active reload. 

Read more about the upcoming release here: https://bit.ly/3XBOKg4

#HITMAN #HitmanVR #Agent47 #PSVR2 #Gaming
